title: I got an s on olaf and I didn't get a chest.
body: I'm not sure if it works like this but I have 4 chests available on my profile and I got an s so I think I should get a chest. Maybe I'm stupid but can someone explain how this works.

replies.body: There are a few other little bits you need to keep in mind as well when it comes to those chests dropping. You can only earn one chest per champion per season. If you've already gotten a chest to drop for Kayn for example, you won't be able to get another one by playing him until the season resets.
